Tagline: The film that redefines group therapy.

Plot Outline: A documentary crew followed Metallica for the better part of 2001-2003, a time of tension and release for the rock band, as they recorded their album St. Anger, fought bitterly, and sought the counsel of their on-call shrink.

A brutally honest, funny, uncomfortable, and enlightening look at Metallica... One of the best pictures of the year..
